title: Introducing: Doldrum
content:
I always get a strange sense of pride when an exciting new artist emerges from my hometown of Newcastle.

So Doldrum aka Craig Clarke and Gary Dempsey (with artwork / visuals from Ruth Sheldon, may still be a little rough around the edges, but there’s certainly potential on their two demo tracks, the downbeat The Sound of My Gun and more pop sensitive The_AList. Whilst the production may lack a big budget (it sounds like they’ve recorded in a bedroom, which I somehow suspect they did), it’s lo-fi pop quite unlike anything else coming from the North East at this moment in time. With a touch more work on their production, and with time on their side, there’s no reason why Doldrum can’t be one of the finest acts to emerge from the North East in recent years.
